author: Paul Maxim
content: I guess we see what we expect to see.  My first thought when I saw this image was a question.  When, I wondered, did Andreas visit the American southwest?  It looks like a sandstone cliff in Zion or Bryce or any number of other places.  Even after I read what it actually was (about a second later) I still thought it looked like red sandstone.  Something like tunnel vision I guess.
